metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17507 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In HDF5 1.10.1, there is an out of bounds read vulnerability in the function H5T_conv_struct_opt in H5Tconv.c in libhdf5.a. For example, h5dump would crash when someone opens a crafted hdf5 file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
